swiggy - Senior Engineering Manager- Serviceability

Location - Bangalore, Karnataka, India, Work Type: Full Time

It August 01, 2022

ABOUT THE TEAM & ROLE:

The Marketplace Fulfillment Team is responsible for the entire post order experience at Swiggy. The team consists of Core Logistics, Driver experience and solutions to enable and power our Customer Service agents with the Agent Workbench, Chatbots and Live Tracking screen for Customers and Agents.

Serviceability within MFP focuses on when to take orders (and when not) based on available supply of drivers, estimated time to deliver etc. It is a customer backwards construct - it endeavors to deliver the best customer experience under the constraints of driver supply, weather/traffic conditions etc. It also makes a “promise” to customers (time to deliver) while making optimal trade-off decisions between “number of orders to accept” and “confidence to deliver within promised SLA”.

What you will be doing

As a Senior engineering Manager, you will be responsible for Leading development teams that are responsible for delivering accurate and timely data in innovative ways for our Engineering teams. The successful candidate will have influence over the vision, features and design of the critical data used to drive the business. You will own all phases of the development lifecycle from gathering business requirements, design and modeling, development, deployment, and support. You are responsible for all things people on your team – hiring and developing a high-performing team of software engineers.

What qualities are we looking for?

  • 10+ years of progressive technology experience in Software Engineering functions and have/show leadership initiatives
  • Proven ability in architecture and building scalable systems.
  • Understand software architecture and system design very well
  • Good at problem-solving and innovative thinking. Love to be Hands-on.
  • The ability to envision the future engineering needs of the company – Plan and implement accordingly The creativity to do things differently
  • The ability to think and plan strategically for the technical needs of the company
  • Skill at collaboratively overcoming objections from team members with dominant personalities

What will you get to do here?

  • Predictably deliver high-quality and scalable software
  • Provide engineering execution excellence, as well as technical vision and direction, to ensure the development team is aligned with the strategy of the company
  • Define objectives and track results for team members in a supportive, motivating, and fact-driven way
  • Proactively identify and resolve issues relating to people, product, tech, and process.
  • Work across other departments to get alignment on dev-related items Coach team members on coding practices and in making business-driven decisions.
  • Lead and manage an effective engineering function to support product development and quality of life for the development team
  • Build a development dream-team, including recruiting, hiring, mentoring, and performance management
  • Work closely with the company leaders including the technical founder, product, operations, and Customer Care to strategically Use fact-based analyses to deliver recommendations
  • Make decisions related to managing the software development process and team

Visit our tech blogs to learn more about some the challenges we deal with:

swiggy - Engineering Manager - UI

ABOUT THE TEAM & ROLE:

As part of the Revenue and Growth team, the New Initiatives vertical targets Swiggy’s uber vision of being Kings of Convenience by providing the on-demand guaranteed deliveries for the newer business lines including Instamart, Genie, Minis, Meats & Alcohol, and Stores Marketplace. This technical vertical inside the Swiggy Tech ecosystem focus to solve multiple business use cases for increasing Swiggy's revenue and providing growth in terms of monthly orders, new customer acquisitions, customer retention, etc. We try to understand our customer behavior and build smart products using cutting-edge technologies to solve these problems at scale. We operate on a scale of millions of customer interactions on the Swiggy App daily.
